text: Salvatore "Toto" Cutugno (; 7 July 1943 – 22 August 2023) was an Italian pop singer-songwriter and musician. He was best known for his worldwide hit song, "". Cutugno also won the Eurovision Song Contest in 1990 with the song "". Cutugno died on 22 August 2023 at a hospital in Milan, Italy from prostate cancer at the age of 80. ==References== ==Other websites== *Official website *Toto Cutugno Booking agent * Toto Cutugno Spain Oficial (Idiomas: Español/Italiano/Inglés) *Toto Cutugo Fanclub Romania * *"Insieme: 1992" lyrics with English translation *MSN Group Category:1943 births Category:2023 deaths Category:Italian singer-songwriters Category:Italian pianists Category:Italian guitarists Category:Drummers Category:Saxophonists Category:Musicians from Milan Category:Writers from Milan Category:Deaths from prostate cancer Category:Sanremo Music Festival winners
title: Toto Cutugno
